fullplot: In New York, an aspiring novelist has a cinq-a-sept affair with the beautiful wife of a French diplomat. Cultures, world views, personal ethics and dietary preferences clash as love deepens, with remarkable results. Romance, drama and comedy.
plot: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married, and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.
title: 5 to 7

tomatoes.consensus: 5 to 7 too often settles for rom-com clichès, but they're offset by its charming stars, sensitive direction, and a deceptively smart screenplay.
